body: Of course, you fucking retards. Fat old "oji-san" type men are the ones who pay the big bucks for her bitch ass. There is another work where she's giving it out to her classmates, all of them, every single one, even mineta. Go wank at that one if it bothers you so much, me? I don't like seeing male main casts from the show, they already get their screen/manga time in official works, I like to think of these type of works as a side story paralleling the official works in the same legit universe (provided that it doesn't break character/immersion too much). See uraraka here? She likes to fawn over the main character-suke, she also likes to bitch her ass off to old men for cash, because she's a binbo (poor) girl with a broke family paying for her expensive tuition at the U.A academy (probably the "Todai" of hero courses) and she didn't get through recommendation so she's more then willing to get pounded and creampied to alleviate her parents monetary burden. There, see? Perfectly canon.
The school if filled with usable characters, yet we go back to the circle of old fat dudes
